context_bundle.summary: Publish/subscribe pattern for event-driven agent communication where publishers broadcast events to multiple subscribers without coupling

onboarding.quick_start: Publisher writes event to shared/events directory, subscribers poll for new events matching their subscribed event types
common_patterns: Event structure: {id, timestamp, publisher, eventType, data}
Subscription: Filter events by eventType prefix matching
Processing markers: Create .{agentId}-processed files to track consumption
Cleanup: Purge processed events older than retention period
known_errors: No delivery guarantees (subscriber may miss events)
Event directory grows unbounded without cleanup
Harder to trace message flow than request/response
